r.s: Driver based class to calculate birthdays of some members of the PHP.net community.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculate the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. This is the driver for calculating the birthdays of some members of the PHP.net community.
r.n: * Fix Bug #14568: test suite is useless - asserts are commented out [kguest] * Fix Bug #14683: ashnazg wants his details added [kguest]
